post.author: 황성규

comment.author: 이성기
comment.content: 김민구씨의 게시판 프로그램을 war로 jrun deploy해보시면 어떨까요.

post.content: 작년에 다운타운에서 JRun 3.0 Seminar에 참석한적이 있는데 그때 메뉴얼이랑 디벨로퍼버젼씨디를 받아왔거든요. 지금 찾아보니까... 된다네요. Deploying Web Applications When you distribute a Web application, you can either distribute it as the expanded directory structure, or you can distribute it as a single, compressed file called a Web Archieve (WAR) file. A WAR file has the extension .war. ... 이성기 wrote: > In tomcat, we can create myproject.war file under tomcat/webapps directory to wrap all class, java, jsp, html, image, properties...for deployment. This makes us to move development file to production server by copying single war file. > > Is it possible in Jrun?
post.title: 당연히 된다고 합니다.
